name: Cor's 2 For 1 Pizza
address: 27256 Fraser Hwy, Langley Twp, BC V4W 3P8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Greek Salad
hasMenuItem.description: With garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Specialty Pizzas 2 for 1: Mix & Match (2 Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Mix and match within the same size.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description: 10 chicken wings with options of BBQ, hot, teriyaki, or honey garlic flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Lasagna - Single
hasMenuItem.description: Choice of sauce and toppings.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheese Only 2 for 1 (2 Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Two small pizzas with cheese. Select crust type for each: regular or thin.

hasMenuItem.name: Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Add chicken, shrimp, or bacon bits for an extra charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Specialty Pizzas 2 for 1: Mix & Match (2 Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Mix and match within the same size.

hasMenuItem.name: Specialty Pizzas 2 for 1: Mix & Match (2 Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Mix and match within the same size.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Two 2 medium pizzas with a choice of regular or thin crust. Select any two toppings from a variety of meats, vegetables, or cheese options for each pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Two large pizzas with a choice of regular or thin crust. Select any 3 toppings from options like bacon, peppers, mushrooms, or olives for each pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 for 1 Pizzas: Special Favourites
hasMenuItem.description: Delivery charge for this item. The extra is added to the price of each size.  Excluding everything pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: 6 Pack of Pop
hasMenuItem.description: Six-pack soda option includes Coke, Diet Coke, Ginger Ale, Iced Tea, Orange, Root Beer, or Sprite.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Two large pizzas with a choice of regular or thin crust. Select any 3 toppings from options like bacon, peppers, mushrooms, or olives for each pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Two large pizzas with choice of regular or thin crust. Select any two toppings from bacon, vegetables, meats including shrimp for the second pizza. Two pizzas combined in one order.

hasMenuItem.name: 4 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Create two large pizzas, selecting a crust type (regular or thin) and up to four toppings from a wide range including meats, vegetables, and more for each.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheese Only 2 for 1 (2 Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Two small pizzas with cheese. Select crust type for each: regular or thin.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Two 2 medium pizzas with a choice of regular or thin crust. Select any two toppings from a variety of meats, vegetables, or cheese options for each pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheese Only 2 for 1 (2 Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Two medium pizzas with cheese. Options for crust: regular or thin for both.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheese Only 2 for 1 (2 Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Two large pizzas, choose crust for each: regular or thin. Cheese topping only.

hasMenuItem.name: 1 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Small)
hasMenuItem.description: 2 small pizzas with choice of regular or thin crust. Pick one topping from a variety including meats, vegetables, or cheeses. Each pizza can have a different single topping.

hasMenuItem.name: 1 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: 2 medium pizzas with choice of regular or thin crust. Select from a variety of toppings including vegetables, meats, and shrimp for second pizza. Each with one topping.

hasMenuItem.name: 1 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Two large pizzas with choice of regular or thin crust. Customize each with one topping from a variety including meats, vegetables, or seafood (shrimp available for the second pizza).

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Two small pizzas, each with a choice of regular or thin crust. Select 3 toppings from a variety including meats, vegetables, and more for each pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Choose two medium pizzas with three toppings each. Options: regular or thin crust; toppings include a variety of meats, vegetables, and more.

hasMenuItem.name: 4 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Two small pizzas, each customizable with regular or thin crust. Choose 4 toppings from options like meats, vegetables, or sun-dried tomatoes for each pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Two small pizzas, each customizable with choice of regular or thin crust. Select any two toppings from a diverse range including meats, vegetables, and more for each pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: 4 Topping 2 for 1 (2 Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Two medium pizzas with choice of regular or thin crust. Pick four toppings from selections including meats like ham, bacon, and chicken, vegetables like mushrooms, green peppers, or jalape単os, and more.

review.reviewBody: this is the go-to place to get food for your kids they have child size ravioli and child size spaghetti and child size lasagna for only $6.99 also the salads are amazing the Greek and the Caesar never disappoint
Pizza not great. tomatoes on pizza tasted sour and bad. soggy bottom on both pizzas. very little cheese. would not order again.
mostly good, but center of butter chicken pizza was undercooked
Fries were undercooked and same with the onion rings, soggy and not appetising.
pizza was partially cooked. soggy in the middle. hard to eat. Greek salad was good.
